DESIGN & DEVELOPMENT PROCESS
Continuous Improvement, Constant Excellence
01
RESEARCH & ANALYSIS
Cloud Interactive Research and Analysis focuses on detailed observation of human needs & behavior as clients interact with your software systems. These observations are distilled into comprehensive profiles of your users. Starting from this deep understanding of the User, Cloud Interactive tailors solutions that match their needs and preferences, market trends, and your business goals.
Heuristic EvaluationsUsability StudiesCompetitive AnalysisUser & System RequirementsPersonaUser Experience StudiesFunctionality Analysis
02
DESIGN
Cloud Interactive provides innovative design consulting services. Our professional interaction designers work with you through all phases of product development, from observation to ideation, wireframing, prototyping, and engineering. Our UX designers have both broad and deep experience in a multitude of fields. They specialize in designing and evaluating human-machine interfaces to deliver a seamless and delightful user experience.
Information ArchitectureTask FlowInteraction Design & WireframeInteractive PrototypesHigh-Fidelity Usability TestingGUI DesignStyle Guide
03
DEVELOPMENT
Cloud Interactive features a highly talented, full-service development team. We pride ourselves on being well-versed in the latest, best-of-breed software development technologies and practices. We are able to construct and customize a full range of end-to-end, scalable and flexible solutions and deliver them across a wide range of screens and platforms.
Front-End DevelopmentBack-End DevelopmentSearch Engine Optimization (SEO)Testing
04
SUPPORT & MAINTENANCE
With cloud deployments and a dedicated 24/7 Global Support & Maintenance team, you can rest assured that your platform will be stable and available whenever your clients need it most, wherever in the world they may be. Our solutions are scalable and flexible, so you can count on a platform that grows alongside your business.
Support ServiceContent MaintenanceDatabase MaintenanceVirtual Server Maintenance
See Services
PROJECT MANAGEMENT
Agile Project Management
Cloud Interactive project managers feature training from world class institutions and agile coaches, and are dedicated to the highest standard of client service. They hold a variety of certifications, including PMP and CSM, and are well versed in current industry best practices. We tailor our approach to best suit your project and business goals.
PROJECT EXECUTION
At Cloud Interactive, your project is resourced with a team that is dedicated to your success. This cross-functional team features professionals from all specializations in software development: UI, UX, SM, PM, PO, Developers, and QA. This team moves in unison to accomplish your goals, and can quickly adapt to the changing needs of your business.Dependent on the parameters of your project, your project team follows a Scrum or Kanban methodology. In this fashion, we are able to provide industry-leading project execution, superlative project control and visibility, and rapid return on investment.
FIXED PRICE AGILE PROJECTS
The realities of financial planning often necessitate fixed-price solutions. Cloud Interactive is experienced with mitering iterative development to a fixed-price model. Using phased projects and iterative, incremental delivery, we deliver the functionality you need on a schedule that suits your business.The benefits of maintaining an Agile methodology within a fixed-price project are higher product quality, reduced costs, and better client satisfaction. Cloud Interactive also offers a range of pricing and partnership models, and flexible payment options, to ensure that we are there to meet the needs of every client regardless of size.
See Projects
READY TO BOOST YOUR BUSINESS?
Web, Mobile, & Cloud: let’s turn your wildest ideas into reality
At Cloud Interactive, our clients are our partners. We work closely with you to deliver innovative and industry-leading software solutions. Our team thrives at the cutting edge, leveraging the latest and most advanced techniques in Intelligent System Development, UX/UI design, software engineering, and project management to take your business to the next level. No firm will work harder (or smarter) than Cloud Interactive to ensure your success.
